snippet: Calls for the release of Jonathan Jay Pollard, who is serving a life sentence in the United States, are growing in Israel as President Obama’s visit nears.
abstract: Calls from prominent Israelis for the release of Jonathan Jay Pollard, who is serving a life sentence in the United States for spying for Israel, are growing in the country as President Obama’s visit nears; campaign to free Pollard, after years of being viewed as marginal and divisive issue, has become mainstream crusade.
lead_paragraph: Calls for the release of Jonathan Jay Pollard, who is serving a life sentence in the United States, are growing in Israel as President Obama’s visit nears.

headline.seo: Push to Free Jonathan Pollard as Obama’s Israel Visit Nears
headline.main: Obama’s Visit to Israel Renews Effort to Free Spy
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Visit to Israel Renews Effort to Free Spy
